DrawHalf.NAME: Draw Half
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, Draw 1 additional card with 50% probability.

Pollute.NAME: Pollute
DESCRIPTIONS: Poison, Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Retaining power only lasts for this turn.

LightPower.NAME: Power of Light
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play Shadow! as the next card, draw 2 cards.

ShadowPower.NAME: Power of Shadow
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play Light! as the next card, draw 2 cards.
